columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: ID of the customer who made the purchase

columns.name: sales_channel
columns.description: Channel through which the sale was made (e.g., Online, In-store)

columns.name: payment_method
columns.description: Payment method used for the sale

columns.name: delivery_date
columns.description: Delivery date of the sold product

columns.name: delivery_status
columns.description: Delivery status of the sold product

columns.name: tax_amount
columns.description: Tax amount applied to the sale

columns.name: ticket_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each support ticket

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: ID of the customer who raised the ticket

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: ID of the product related to the ticket

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the ticket (e.g., Open, Closed)

columns.name: response_time
columns.description: Time taken to respond to the ticket

columns.name: feedback_score
columns.description: Feedback score given by the customer

columns.name: follow_up_date
columns.description: Date for a follow-up on the ticket

columns.name: channels
columns.description: Marketing channels used in the campaign (e.g., TV, Social Media)

columns.name: goal
columns.description: Primary goal of the campaign (e.g., Brand Awareness, Lead Generation)

columns.name: region
columns.description: Geographical region targeted by the campaign

columns.name: creative_idea
columns.description: Creative idea or theme of the campaign

columns.name: ad_spend
columns.description: Amount spent on advertising during the campaign

columns.name: leads_generated
columns.description: Number of leads generated through the campaign

columns.name: conversions
columns.description: Number of conversions achieved through the campaign

columns.name: roi
columns.description: Return on investment for the campaign

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: Contact phone number for the department

columns.name: number_of_employees
columns.description: Number of employees in the department

columns.name: subsidiary
columns.description: Subsidiary under which the department operates

columns.name: main_product
columns.description: Main product the department deals with

columns.name: inventory_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each inventory record

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: ID of the product in inventory

columns.name: reorder_level
columns.description: Stock level at which reorder is needed

columns.name: reorder_quantity
columns.description: Quantity to reorder when stock is low

columns.name: expiry_date
columns.description: Expiry date of the product batch

columns.name: manufacture_date
columns.description: Manufacture date of the product batch

columns.name: last_restock_date
columns.description: Date when the product was last restocked

columns.name: cost_per_unit
columns.description: Cost per unit of the product

columns.name: contact_name
columns.description: Contact person's name at the supplier

columns.name: contact_email
columns.description: Contact person's email at the supplier

columns.name: contact_phone
columns.description: Contact person's phone number at the supplier

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the supplier is located

columns.name: state
columns.description: State where the supplier is located

columns.name: zip_code
columns.description: ZIP code of the supplier's location

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country where the supplier is located

columns.name: payment_terms
columns.description: Payment terms agreed with the supplier

columns.name: delivery_schedule
columns.description: Delivery schedule agreed with the supplier

columns.name: last_order_date
columns.description: Date when the last order was placed with the supplier

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: ID of the customer who placed the order

columns.name: order_date
columns.description: Date when the order was placed

columns.name: order_status
columns.description: Current status of the order (e.g., Processing, Shipped, Delivered)

columns.name: shipping_date
columns.description: Date when the order was shipped

columns.name: delivery_date
columns.description: Date when the order was delivered

columns.name: shipping_method
columns.description: Shipping method used for the order

columns.name: payment_method
columns.description: Payment method used for the order

columns.name: discount_amount
columns.description: Discount amount applied to the order

columns.name: currency
columns.description: Currency in which the order was placed

columns.name: date_of_birth
columns.description: Date of birth of the customer

columns.name: loyalty_status
columns.description: Loyalty status of the customer (e.g., Gold, Silver)

columns.name: last_purchase_date
columns.description: Date of the last purchase made by the customer
